addTransferLock(uint256,uint256).details: Block timestamp may be innaccurate by up to 15 minutes, but on a timescale of years this is negligible.

params.amount: the amount of tokens to restrict the transfer of.
params.deadline: the date (as a unix timestamp in UTC) until which amount will be untransferrable.

params.account: the address that granted the allowance.
params.recipient: the address that is allowed to add transfer locks.

batchTransferWithLocks(address[],uint256.details: block timestamp may be innaccurate by up to 15 minutes, but on the expected timescales, this is negligible.

params.amounts: the amounts of tokens to transfer.
params.deadlines: the dates (as unix timestamps in UTC) until which amounts will be untransferrable.
params.recipients: the addresses to transfer tokens to.

params.account: the address to decrease the allowance for.
params.amount: the amount to decrease the allowance by.

returns.amount: the amount of tokens that are not transfer-locked.
the amount of tokens that are not transfer-locked.
the amount of tokens that are transfer-locked.
the amount of tokens that are transfer-locked.

params.account: the address to increase the allowance for.
params.amount: the amount to increase the allowance by.

transferWithLock(address,uint256,uint256.details: block timestamp may be innaccurate by up to 15 minutes, but on the expected timescales, this is negligible.

params.amount: the amount of tokens to transfer.
params.deadline: the date (as a unix timestamp in UTC) until which amount will be untransferrable.
params.recipient: the address to transfer tokens to.

addTransferLock(uint256,uint256).notice: Used to voluntarily lock up `amount` tokens until a given time. Tokens in excess of `amount` may be transferred.

allowances(address,address).notice: Returns the number of transfer locks `account` has permitted `recipient`.

batchTransferWithLocks(address[],uint256.notice: Used to transfer tokens to multiple addresses and lock them up until a given time.

decreaseTransferLockAllowance(address,ui.notice: Used to decrease the number of transfer locks that can be added by another address. This cannot be used to revoke or otherwise remove an existing transfer lock, only to reduce the number of additional locks that can be added by the specified account.

getAvailableBalance(address).notice: Returns the amount of tokens that are not locked up as of current block.timestamp.

getAvailableBalanceAt(address,uint256).notice: Retrieves the balance of an account that is not locked at a given timestamp.

getTransferLockTotal(address).notice: Returns the total amount locked up as of current block.timestamp. Returns 0 if there are no transfer locks.

getTransferLockTotalAt(address,uint256).notice: Returns the total amount locked up as of the given timestamp. Returns 0 if there are no transfer locks.

increaseTransferLockAllowance(address,ui.notice: Used to increase the number of transfer locks that can be added by another address. Only allowing a limited number of locks to be added by a given address prevents a variety of potentially abusive patterns.

transferWithLock(address,uint256,uint256.notice: Used to transfer tokens to an address and lock them up until a given time.
